summaries.short: Two women called Catherine and Sabine are interviewing a man named Tim about his self-started web design company.
summaries.medium: Two women, Catherine and Sabine, are interviewing the owner of a self-started company called Tim. His company is based primarily on web design and offering his clients the freedom and exploration to create an ideal website for their company.
summaries.long: Two women called Catherine and Sabine are interviewing a man called Tim about his self-started web design company. He’s from Portsmouth in the UK. He used to do contract work and then he decided to start his own web design company. He did it for the amount of control and power he would have over his own company as well as presenting himself with a challenge to start a business. He talks about the company naming and how hard it can be to name a company from scratch. He then discusses the clients and how much freedom they have when designing and creating their own website. He also talks about the problems that present themselves and how they go about fixing them with simple solutions. Finally, he talks about the dangers of overworking himself and how it’s good to take a break every now and again.
